medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe left lower quadrant pain for 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours prior to presentation, characterized by severe LLQ pain that worsened after eating 1 piece of toast. The patient has had no oral intake, no bowel movements, and has not experienced nausea or vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Stage III chronic kidney disease, Hypertension, Type 2 diabetes, Glaucoma
